title: Our Prince is Too Lovely - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Body-double   Cross-dressing   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Tomboyish Female Lead
author: Aoyagi Hajime   青柳朔
description:
To obtain the throne and have love bloom, this prince will—cross-dress?!

It's true that I want to show Ray what I can do and have her see me as a man.

—But, isn't it somewhat wrong to have to cross-dress to do that?!

In a trial to be bestowed the title of crown prince, Prince Adolbert of Hausenland aimed to obtain the right to diplomatically trade pearls from the southern king, famous for being sharp and capable.

The method he chose to conquer the lady-killer king was—to pretend to be the famous, unparalleled beauty, his twin sister Princess Linol!? Together with Ray, a knight dressed as a man with whom he secretly fell in love, Adol will succeed in his mission…or will he? >
